channel.title: Code Virtualizers
channel.description:
What do you guys reckon about Code virtualizers like VMProtect or Oreans Code Virtualizer?
Is using products like these a good method of obfuscating and hiding malware?
You would ever use these products?

This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
